originalText.text:
Extremely disappointing with the service I have gotten from a receptionist named Natalie.  I came for my appointment at 10:25 my apt was for 10:30. As soon as I got there the receptionist asked me to fill out reg forms and give her my id.  Which I did and I also told her I am exiting patient.   Natalie holding my id told me that she does not find me.  I  filled reg forms and was waiting for my apt. Natalie after 40 min of me waiting comes and spokes to me and another couple that came 20 after me and she told us that our insurance she could not check because her system was down.  .  Both of us paid our copay and waiting to be called.  For some reason the patient that came 20
Min after was called 1st. This is waiting over 40 min. My wife asked why that patient was called before us.  This is when Natalie started being rude and raising her voice at my wife.  I got upset and asked for my copay back which I paid I was ready to
Leave.  I really believe Natalie never put my information into computer.   Finally when I was called in the room provider was extremely knowledgeable and he did tell me that I had a chart for my previous visits.    The whole experience could have been avoided if the receptionist was kinder and listened to what I was trying to tell her.  I honestly don’t write any reviews but when this receptionist started getting angry and yelled at my wife this is where I get upset.  Please resolve this issue

originalText.text:
This is an amazing place to get dermatology care. Everyone is so kind. Everyone aways tries to heip in any way they possibly can. I'm extremely glad I found them through Dr.Jacob Levitt. He is a curing a condition that over a period of 2 1/2 years, at least 10 other doctors could not help.

I'm very appreciative.

I'm very appreciative.

originalText.text: I was very pleasantly surprised how great my experience was. They accept many different insurance types and don't require a referral. I got a next day appointment and  everything was smooth. The doctor explained everything very patiently and everyone I talked to was pleasant and helpful. Would definitely recommend!

text.text: I was very pleasantly surprised how great my experience was. They accept many different insurance types and don't require a referral. I got a next day appointment and  everything was smooth. The doctor explained everything very patiently and everyone I talked to was pleasant and helpful. Would definitely recommend!

originalText.text: The doctor who saw me (Dr. Elsa Glaser) was disinterested and dismissive. It was an upsetting experience. I went in with many questions prepared; she dismissed my first question and discouraged my others. She did no examination whatsoever. I attribute it to her apparent dislike of treating older women. And they told me my visit was covered by insurance and then sent me a bill.

text.text: The doctor who saw me (Dr. Elsa Glaser) was disinterested and dismissive. It was an upsetting experience. And they told me my visit was covered by insurance and then sent me a bill.

originalText.text: Midday midweek appointments are fine, and Hailey Brickman is great, but don't come on the weekend unless you want to wait forty minutes past your appointment time.

text.text: Midday midweek appointments are fine, and Hailey Brickman is great, but don't come on the weekend unless you want to wait forty minutes past your appointment time.
